description.displayText: Hi my name is Jessica P. & I have been knowing Mariel for over 8 years now. I hired multiple cleaning companies in the past that I was never satisfied with until Mariel came to my house the first day to see my house. The first time she came she took her time & really cleaned everything my house felt so light and spotless. After 7 years of cleaning my house she maintains it & leaves it spotless like always! I would definitely recommend her to anyone looking for a long term relationship with house cleansing.
